item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Requirements You need to install some prerequisite packages in order to use Vulecc: # Install docker curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sh get-docker.sh Start a Vulecc launcher Login to your Vulecc account and copy the commands in the prompt.
